description: Stored Cross Site Scripting in Online Fire Reporting System v1.2 by PHPGurukul, that consists in a stored authenticated XSS due to the lack of propper validation of user inputs 'fullname', 'location' and 'message' parameters via POST at the endpoint '/ofrs/reporting.php'. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal its cookie session details.
